advent.name: Advent
advent.description: Science fiction-themed events that may change the area's future

cards.cue: LIFE SUPPORT TECH IS FAILING AND NO ONE CAN FIX IT:
AN ANTI-TECH MOVEMENT IS RAPIDLY GAINING GROUND:
interpretations: DUE TO A DISASTER, DATA LEAK

cards.cue: A DANGEROUS EXPERIMENT IS MISSING FROM A LAB:
interpretations: A VIRUS, SUPERWEAPON, OR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE

cards.cue: AN ALIEN SPECIES IS RUNNING RAMPANT THROUGH THE ECOSYSTEM:
interpretations: IT IS HUNT-LIKE, TECHNOLOGY-LIKE, OR BIO-LIKE

cards.cue: A SILO OF SOMETHING DANGEROUS IS STARTING TO LEAK:
interpretations: DANGEROUS TO PEOPLE, THE CONTAINS ARE BIOLOGICAL, CHEMICAL, UNSTABLE, OR BLUE

cards.cue: THE STATE IS LAUNCHING NEW CONTROL MEASURES ON THE POPULATION:
interpretations: SURVEILLANCE, POLICE POWERS, OR PSYCHOLOGICAL CONDITIONING

cards.cue: AN IMPORTANT POWER SOURCE IS RUNNING OUT:
interpretations: AN ANCIENT RELIC, IS RUNNING OUT; OR A RELIGIOUS SYMBOL, OR ORGANISM

cards.cue: THEY HAVE JUST CREATED A NEW FORM OF LIFE:
interpretations: AN EXTINCT CLONE, GENETIC HYBRID, OR CYBORG

usage.description: A 60-card science fiction expansion with genre-focused cards for creating futuristic worlds and settings
integration: Use only expansion cards - Create a world of up to 8 microsettings with cohesive sci-fi focus
Mix expansion cards into the main deck - Add sci-fi embellishments without restricting to single genre
Mix cards and use a sideboard - Less random, more intentional worldbuilding when mixing multiple expansions
